entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Gillam
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:46 PM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Drifting Snow, -34.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gillam Airport 11:29 PM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023
Condition: Drifting Snow
Temperature: -34.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.9 kPa rising
Visibility: 6.4 km
Humidity: 61 %
Wind Chill: -49
Dewpoint: -39.0°C
Wind: NNW 22 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 37.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear late this evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 37. Wind chill minus 39 this evening and minus 52 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023
